template_reference.name: district_bonus
template_reference.comment:
Ovoo district bonus.
Production buildings can produce double units at the cost of stone.
Upgrade bonus at the cost of stone.

template_reference.name: district_bonus
template_reference.comment:
Stupa specialization bonus (Monasteries grant the Ovoo bonus).
Production buildings can produce double units at the cost of stone.
Upgrade bonus at the cost of stone.
